UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate if the user has administrator privileges.

isFounder.description: Flag to indicate if the user is a founder.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in the EmityGate empire.

description.description: A short description of the project.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the project.

iconImage.description: A Base64 data URI of the project's icon image.

color.description: The hsl color of the project planet.

tier.description: The orbital tier of the planet (core, inner, outer).

sizePreset.description: The size preset of the planet.

glowIntensity.description: The intensity of the planet's glow effect (1-10).

size.description: The size of the planet in pixels.

orbit.description: The orbit radius of the planet in pixels.

angle.description: The starting angle of the planet on its orbit.

speed.description: The orbital speed of the planet.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores information about the EmityGate projects.
